# 数值优化 {#optimation}

## 测试函数

$$f(x,y) = 3*(1-x)*\mathrm{e}^{-x^2 - (y+1)^2} - 10*(\frac{x}{5} - x^3 - y^5)*\mathrm{e}^{-x^2-y^2} - \frac{1}{3}*\mathrm{e}^{-(x+1)^2-y^2}$$

多元函数求导

符号微分，表达式微分
符号求导，表达式求导

```{r}
peaks_fun <- expression(3*(1-x)*exp^(-x^2 - (y+1)^2) - 10*(x/5 - x^3 - y^5)*exp^(-x^2-y^2) -1/3*exp^(-(x+1)^2-y^2))
```

```{r}
D(peaks_fun, "x")
D(peaks_fun, "y")
```
